Articles.Content:
I voted Avera9eJoe in the recent Oscar-B Awards ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also,

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AE1346uOKJs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 OMG!
You create epic looking planes and lots of cool stuff.

> 
> I complement you because your signature is just too beautiful! I literally stop and look at it for a few seconds whenever I see it. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Seconded, is there a source pic for that?

I love your replicas a lot - They really capture the "feel" and "look" of a fighter jet. You once privately asked me for a download of a certain airliner since you wanted an F-16 to intercept it for a screenshot. Plus, I really like the videos you produce to showcase the replicas! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
that shuttle was my favorite!

> 
> I love your replicas a lot - They really capture the "feel" and "look" of a fighter jet. You once privately asked me for a download of a certain airliner since you wanted an F-16 to intercept it for a screenshot. Plus, I really like the videos you produce to showcase the replicas! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Well I wasn't fishing but I like what I caught. Here's the pic.

![nyY4ItE.png](http://i.imgur.com/nyY4ItE.png)

I need to update it though. The Raptor has been upgraded since then & I've gotten better at synchro flying. I'll also make a video. You got a favorite craft these days Columbia?

> 
> You create epic looking planes and lots of cool stuff.

Also sorry Yukon, I didn't mean to skip you. We're friends but I don't remember why. I know it's because you've helped me at some point in the past with something, mods maybe? But thanks again duder.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-04T04:47:06Z" title="08/04/2015 04:47  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 4, 2015</time> by clown\_baby**
Jaw-droppingly excellent craft there. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I complement you because your signature is just too beautiful! I literally stop and look at it for a few seconds whenever I see it. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> 
> Seconded, is there a source pic for that?

It actually isn't my pic, but a user made a bunch and some people have started using them for sigs.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34329-Renderings-of-my-favourite-planets-muns-in-banner-form](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34329-Renderings-of-my-favourite-planets-muns-in-banner-form)
I know, you, you old nut... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Sampa, you are an all around great person ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
as are you!

Sampa, you're a nice and humorous poster, especially in the Forum Games. I also like your user title.. Love the reference. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Also, you're good "friends" with Xannari Ferrows.
Your active on the forums, and i've noticed that you are on my page as a 'recent' visitor, and I appreciate that! I also really love the STS Shuttle Carrier.

MacGamer, it takes a rare and amazing individual to enjoy using a Mac, even more-so to play games on one. Well done, my friend, well done!

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Hk8hxjpnUiw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
ComradeWolfe.. Wow, I really like that name. Really creative. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Appreciated your comment earlier.

This one's a bit narcissistic and asinine... But...

Columbia was nice to me, and that means he/she is ok in my book. He/she was also nice to you Sampa, and therefore you have the endorsement of someone who again is ok in my book. Therefore you are, to me, an alright guy/gal by association! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I think that works out to being a compliment somehow. I hope.

Also, thanks Columbia.
Thank you as well, Comrade! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) You're really friendly.
Sampa was the first to become a part of my thread, and is the only one to stick with it at the moment! Good job!

I liked War of Insanity, although I never played it myself.

Also, I think you were ninja'd.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T05:22:10Z" title="08/06/2015 05:22  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by Columbia**

It's nice to see you here & back in the light green group, but hey, you know, i'm not really at ease with compliments, any way it's one or some, sort of ; )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T21:52:15Z" title="08/06/2015 09:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**

You're a very, very unique forum-goer, and you really stand out from other people. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-07T11:41:58Z" title="08/07/2015 11:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 7, 2015</time> by Columbia**
hihi you like Bonn ; ; ; so you can't be wrong xDr

Do you know I've been clicking all over your most awesome signature for the past few days? It's full of buttons!!!1 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
you're welcome ; but remember ; ) sig are never reality ; ÃƒÂ t least tha,t;s fit or it's close in some ways
